quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't—you're right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
author: Will Durant

quote: Well done is better than well said.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: No man was ever wise by chance.
author: Seneca

quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
author: Seneca

quote: You have power over your mind—not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
author: Seneca

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Be so good they can't ignore you.
author: Steve Martin

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Fortune favors the bold.
author: Virgil

quote: If it is not right, do not do it; if it is not true, do not say it.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Sprague

quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: The price of anything is the amount of life you exchange for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
author: John Wooden

quote: Be quick, but don't hurry.
author: John Wooden

quote: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: What would you attempt to do if you knew you could not fail?
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Don't wish it were easier; wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Courage is grace under pressure.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Perfect is the enemy of the good.
author: Voltaire

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
author: Edmund Hillary

quote: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, be nothing.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

quote: Don't count the days; make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: I am the master of my fate, I am the captain of my soul.
author: William Ernest Henley

quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
author: Gary Player

quote: Screw it, let’s do it.
author: Richard Branson

quote: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: The difference between successful people and really successful people is that really successful people say no to almost everything.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: What we obtain too cheap, we esteem too lightly.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
author: Plato

quote: Well begun is half done.
author: Aristotle

quote: We can’t help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Do, or do not. There is no try.
author: Yoda

quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Grit is living life like it's a marathon, not a sprint.
author: Angela Duckworth

quote: The greater the obstacle, the more glory in overcoming it.
author: Molière

quote: If you want to be happy, be.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Lost time is never found again.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Diligence is the mother of good luck.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: He who is brave is free.
author: Seneca

quote: We become what we think about.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: What you do every day matters more than what you do once in a while.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
author: Confucius

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: It takes as much energy to wish as it does to plan.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Dreams don’t work unless you do.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The sun himself is weak when he first rises, and gathers strength and courage as the day gets on.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
author: Henry Ford

quote: What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: If you want something you’ve never had, you must be willing to do something you’ve never done.
author: Unknown

quote: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
author: Karen Lamb

quote: What you do speaks so loudly that I cannot hear what you say.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
author: Walter Elliot

quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Success is not the result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Everything negative—pressure, challenges—is all an opportunity for me to rise.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: We keep moving forward, opening new doors, and doing new things, because we’re curious and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths.
author: Walt Disney
